name: Paneer Tikka
description: Grilled chunks of paneer marinated in spicy yogurt-based masala, served with mint chutney.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy fried rolls stuffed with spiced veggies, served with sweet chili sauce.

name: Hara Bhara Kebab
description: Green veggie patties made with spinach, peas, and spices. Served hot with chutney.

name: Chicken Lollipop
description: Deep-fried chicken wings in Indo-Chinese style, crispy outside and juicy inside.

name: Corn Cheese Balls
description: Golden-fried balls loaded with sweet corn and molten cheese, crunchy and creamy.

name: Tandoori Mushrooms
description: Button mushrooms marinated in spicy tandoori masala and grilled to perfection.

name: Crispy Baby Corn
description: Deep-fried baby corn tossed with Indo-Chinese sauces, served hot and spicy.

name: Stuffed Potato Skins
description: Potato skins stuffed with cheese, veggies, and spices, baked to golden crispiness.
